name: Sam H
text: The people working are efficient and helpful. Always delicious pizza!

name: Manda Schwerin
text: Haven't ordered in a couple years due to taste, tried again tonight and was told there was 1 1/2 hour wait ok...fine with that but ended up waiting over two hours for food will not be ordering again.

name: Greg Camburn
text: First order from this location and also the last.  Pizzas looked like the driver carried them on their sides with more cheese in the corner of the box than on the crust.  Two pizzas ordered yet one was under-cooked and the other â€¦More

name: John LaRock
text: We have six pizza places in Whitmore Lake and I only like hungry Howie's now I do not like hungry Howie's I get pizza with part of the pizza with nothing on it now today too much sauce no consistency in the product I will save my money

name: Trisha Poitevint
text: Ordered 40$ worth of nasty food just now , lettuce was so old the bread was gross alot of butter on it but the cheese wasnt even all the way in it.  I'm positive we got old food.  Never again , find a better local buisness to support .... â€¦More

name: Morgan Rohn
text: Great pizza, pretty fast service, fast delivery. One of my favorite places to get pizza

name: R.R. E.
text: I recently had Pizza from 3 different places and all over the same weekend. I got Hungry Howie's, Marco's & Jets. I ordered one Friday night, one Saturday night, and one Sunday night. Each was a Medium and they all had identicle items on â€¦More

name: B Hawthorne
text: 2nd time now I've called and they've been closed almost an hour early.

name: Rose Atwood
text: I use the online app and it works great!! Everyone there is so nice. I would highly recommend them to anyone

name: Yeah Reptile Breeding
text: Favorite place to order, good chicken, good pizza, good delivery time, decent pricing

name: Jordan Kurowski
text: Pizza has been a lot better since new GM took over.  Always been fast and on time. Thank you

name: P R
text: Best pizza place.... Love the flavored crust! The howie bread is great too!

name: Ralphie
text: Clean. Up to date. Friendly and quick service inside. On line ordering seems flawless so far. Carryout or delivery only. No seating available.  Delivery is typically quick and friendly.  This place has improved tremendously over the years.  Conveniently located in out-dated plaza off US-23

name: donald bell
text: Good food and better staff.

name: Heather Tester
text: Best pizza ever lol love the subs

name: Edit, Rose and Kayla
text: Good service, great pizza

name: Kaitlyn Hinkle
text: Online ordering is a breeze! Have never had any issues with delivery. Quality is good. Their online rewards system is great too! Got a free medium two-topping pizza from it!

name: Sir Chat
text: Howie's cheesy bread is great and the Asian flavored wings are exceptional. Excellent deliver time and delivery personnel is very respectful.

name: Jim Knicley
text: Great pizza and great service!

name: Tyler Cole
text: Employees are great! Always fast and enjoy ordering online. Every 12th pizza is freeðŸ˜‰

name: Austin Gray
text: My girlfriend ordered a heart pizza online. The card was charged and she called about the pizza. The staff said they were out and that her card and name was never in the system, even tho the bank card had been charged. They were rude about â€¦More

name: Logan Davis
text: The food here is generally pretty ok, but there are better options in town. Where they really dominate other places is with their calzones, which are all delicious and reasonably priced. Their salads also rock, their pizza is ok but personally I prefer other chains.

name: Pat Bingham
text: We've been getting pizza here for over 10 years and have had many very good pizzas and great service. They have good specials and fair prices too.

name: erin yee
text: ordered from here before for a delivery, never had an issue. order tonight and receive a call that they donâ€™t deliver here we are less than 3 miles away and told us to call the brighton store even though they are farther away from us. this â€¦More

name: LynDi SauPer
text:
If I could give no star I would.

Living in Whitmore Lake your options are limited for pizza delivery. â€¦More

name: Rory Watson
text: Great food, great people!!

name: Steve Johnson
text: Great  prices real good pizza for the price

name: jennifer read
text: Order 2 subs and a salad and they messed the order up. Im so mad they typically mess me order up felt like the or was slopped together.. Then i cal to complain and they are closed. So here i am. Mad AF and hungrey. Spent 26 dollars to not eat ... cool!

name: Charlie Tussle
text: If you've got an appetite and fifteen minutes to spare, dial up this store and you won't be disappointed. Excellent pizza!

name: Cheryl Mayo
text: Good pizza, good deals, good service.

name: Shaun Raby
text: Great all the time

name: kitty cat
text: Awesome pizza

name: Chris Marcicky
text: Something is seriously wrong with this place! I spent over 15 mins on hold without ever speaking to a human being. Don't waste your time!!!

name: Brian Rowe
text: Absolutely terrible. Our family ordered a few pizzas and they arrived cold and undercooked. Drive to another restaurant or choose another chain. Do not waste your money here.

name: Ryan Elkins
text: Decided i wanted a pizza last minute called on my way and it was ready when i walked in the door!

name: Will W
text: The food is on par with other hungry Howies but I always have to wait when I get there if I order food online. â€¦More

name: John Mckinzie
text:
Pizza is fine a bit on the slow side no where to really wait for your order
Don't know why this store has higher prices than other H.H. stores

name: William Hazel
text: I ordered a pizza online and the delivered in 40 mins. I waited an hour and twenty mins before I called the store. The person who answered the phone was incredibly rude and told me that my food was on the way. After 2 hours and 20 min I â€¦More

name: Jasmine Kee
text: This hungry Howies messes up my order every other time I order. Not only that but they offer little reconciliation. Today I was charged for a topping I did not order. When I told them they mess up my order every other time the girl at the â€¦More

name: Kim L
text: Good food... great people that work here!!!

name: Renee Hollister
text: My salami in my salad was moldy.

name: Zak Petty
text: Hungry howies is my favorite non-dine in pizza place there is. I love all of there food and never get sick of it. That said, this is the worst Hungry Howies ive seen. I once ordered a pizza and went to pick it up and they apparently didnt â€¦More

name: Garrett Carpenter
text: I don't think there has ever been a Howie Nowie ready to pick up here. Good pizza though.

name: eric mccausland
text: I ordered an order of 3-cheeser bread and 2 howie nowies and it was 20 bucks... I didn't realize that the 3 cheeser bread was so expensive. Next time I suppose ill just order a howie nowie with not toppings just cheese. Its just about the same.

text: Always good food

name: Dean Hellerud
text: Where did quality go

text: It's Hungry Howie's Pizza

name: Jim Gach
text: My favorite

name: Heather Radakovic
text: Overall I like this location. Just several times they've given me regular Howie bread when I ordered cheese bread.

text: I order from here. It is just what you would expect.

text: I enjoyed my food it was awesome
